lead_paragraph: TULLY--Dan. The Board of Directors, administration, physicians and staff of Stamford Health mourn the loss of our dear friend and benefactor, Daniel Patrick Tully, who, along with his wife Grace, established the Daniel and Grace Tully & Family Health Center in 2002. The Tully family's commitment to helping others has improved the health of hundreds of thousands of people in lower Fairfield County, CT and beyond. We will always be grateful for the countless ways Dan inspired us, and his kind and generous spirit will help us care for families for generations to come. Andrew M. Merrill, Chair, Board of Directors; Brian G. Grissler, President and CEO, Stamford Health; H. Darrell Harvey and George Sarner, Co-Chairs, Stamford Hospital Foundation 1/3
